subject: 快来pixiv投稿 4月新番 相关插画吧！
body:
亲爱的用户，您好。

近来气温愈见暑热，无不宣告着夏日临近。

在日本，每逢季度伊始，电视台都会播放新的系列动画，也就是大家熟知的「新番动画」。

今年也不乏众多精彩新番火热播出，pixiv上的同人创作亦如火如荼！

4月番收官在即！用二创来分享对支持作品的「喜爱」吧！

2025年的4月番纷纷即将迎来最终回。

在这些作品中，是否有让大家倾心的作品？

若有喜爱的作品，不妨试着用二创来表达所受触动！

你的画作不仅能为作品增添更多热度，更有可能成为全球同好交流的桥梁！

在最终回放送之际，诚邀大家投稿满载心意的创作，一起来为完结撒花！

由此投稿！ https://www.pixiv.net/illustration/create

当前pixiv上最火爆的4月番有哪些？

pixiv上的4月番相关投稿作品看这里！

https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/127748042

https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/130024498

https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/129580598

衷心感谢大家持续在pixiv上分享佳作。

期待与各位的下一件作品邂逅！

subject: 转发：Final Specs Confirmation and Contract Preparation – Monitoring & Diagnostic Equipment
body:
Dear Joja Health Solutions,

Thank you for the detailed proposal and virtual demo session last week. After internal evaluation, we are moving forward with your VitalSure Pro Series for our upcoming diagnostics lab rollout across three regional branches.

Before we proceed with the contract, we would appreciate clarification on the following:


Final confirmation of unit specs, especially connectivity with our LIS systems



Delivery timeline commitment for all 25 units to our warehouses in Munich, Stuttgart, and Dresden



Invoicing procedures and whether partial shipment is possible



Point of contact for post-sale training and technical support


Assuming these points are confirmed, we aim to sign the contract by next Tuesday and complete procurement before the end of this quarter.

Looking forward to your swift reply.

Warm regards,
 Stefan Klein
 Procurement Director
 HelixCare Diagnostics Group
 stefan.klein@helixcare.de
 +49 89 2193 0034
intent: Confirm final specs and contract details before signing.

subject: 转发：Product Information Request – Diagnostic Equipment
body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I recently came across your company while researching innovative diagnostic equipment for clinical use. Your product line looks quite interesting, particularly the portable ultrasound and digital ECG systems.

At this point, I’m still gathering information and exploring options for our clinic's future upgrade plan. Could you kindly send me your product catalog or brochure, along with general pricing information?

Thank you in advance.

Best regards,
 Sandra Lee
 Founder, Evergreen Family Clinic
 sandra.lee@evergreenclinic.org
 +1-503-555-2964
intent: Request product catalog and pricing for diagnostic equipment.

subject: 转发：Request for Quotation – Portable Vital Signs Monitors
body:
DearJoja Health Solutions,

I’m currently evaluating options for upgrading our clinic’s vital signs monitoring equipment, and your products came recommended by a colleague who attended MedTech Europe last month. The VersaScan S3 portable monitor looks like a potential fit for our needs.

Could you please provide:


A quotation for 5–10 units including shipping to Prague, Czech Republic;



Technical datasheet and user manual (if available);



Information about integration with existing EMR systems.


We are planning to finalize vendor selection by the end of next month, so your timely response would be appreciated.

Kind regards,
 Martin Novak
 Operations Manager
 WellCare Medical Group
 martin.novak@wellcare.cz
 +420 602 855 731
intent: Request quotation for portable vital signs monitors

subject: 转发：Request for Detailed Proposal – ICU Patient Monitoring System
body:
Dear Joja Health Solutions,

Thank you for the initial information you shared last week regarding the NeuroPulse MX500 monitoring system. After internal discussions, our clinical and procurement teams believe this solution could meet the needs of our ICU expansion project scheduled for implementation in Q4.

We would now like to move forward with a detailed commercial proposal, including:


Final pricing for 12–15 units with volume discount structure



Lead time and shipping options to Singapore



Terms for warranty, maintenance, and on-site support



Payment terms and installation services


We’ve shortlisted three vendors, and our final selection will be made within the next 2–3 weeks. If possible, we’d also appreciate a short demo session with one of your specialists to address a few technical integration questions.

Looking forward to your proposal.

Best regards,
 Dr. Rachel Lim
 Head of Medical Technology Procurement
 Northview General Hospital
 rachel.lim@northview.sg
 +65 6123 8844
intent: Request detailed proposal for patient monitoring system
